entities.description: The total number of responses before any weighting is applied.
The total number of responses after weighting has been applied to represent the entire population.
Various statistical measures such as mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
The location in the dataset where this value appears.
The type of variable represented in the dataset (e.g., numeric).
The number of valid responses that were analyzed.

relationships.description: Indicates the number of actual responses gathered in the survey before applying any weighting.
Represents the number of weighted responses, giving a more accurate reflection of the overall population.
Includes statistical metrics such as mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Specifies the location in the dataset where the statistical measure appears.
Defines the type of variable represented in the dataset.
Indicates the number of valid responses that were analyzed in the survey.
